channel.title: Need Help with my client it logs in then immediately kicks me out?
channel.description: i got my client all set up everythings perfect but when i try to log on via ip: 127.0.0.1 it logs in and show the chat box and inventory but the screens blank for like 3 seconds then immediately kicks me out? This is the error i get in the client: "i3: -1 Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36 error saving TITLE.DAT any ideas? :\ error saving TITLEBOX.DAT error saving INDEX.DAT-null error saving TITLEBUTTON.DAT error saving INDEX.DAT-null"

item.title: Need Help with my client it logs in then immediately kicks me out?
item.dc:creator: @killermoe33 killermoe33
item.description:
@killermoe33 wrote:

i got my client all set up everythings perfect but when i try to log on via ip: 127.0.0.1 it logs in and show the chat box and inventory but the screens blank for like 3 seconds then immediately kicks me out? This is the error i get in the client: “i3: -1
Error: T1 - 123,0 - 36,36
error saving TITLE.DAT any ideas? :
error saving TITLEBOX.DAT
error saving INDEX.DAT-null
error saving TITLEBUTTON.DAT
error saving INDEX.DAT-null”
